title: Paradigms for Unconditional Pseudorandom Generators
timeline: We posted a manuscript online in March 2023; the survey was published in Foundations and Trends in Theoretical Computer Science in February 2024.
version-notes: The preliminary version of the survey was titled "Theory of Unconditional Pseudorandom Generators." Besides the title change, the published version has some additional introductory material and various minor improvements.
